goals.active: Follow the High Priestess's procession to Lorantl Grounds.
goals.complete: We followed High Priestess Ecolotl's procession to Lorantl Grounds and confronted her with our proof of the undead corruption. She was convinced, but we soon realized that sooner or later, the undead will come to overwhelm the village. We decided to return and help the village prepare to defend itself.
